name: extract-first-line
description: Extract the first line from a multiline string at a specified path

input.description: Any JSON object containing a string value at the specified path

path.description: Dot-separated path to the string field (e.g., 'data.message')

output.description: The first line of the string, or null if path doesn't exist or value is not a string

examples.description: Extract first line from Unix newlines
Extract first line from Windows newlines
